name: Amiga Mega Pak
overview: Amiga Mega Pak is a compilation that includes a mixture of games and utilities (some of which are PD): DISK 1 • Inertia Drive • Amiga Type • Directory Utility II v. 4.0 • Cat & Mouse • Rebound DISK 2 • Diablo • Shooting Star • Jigsaw (Pieces) • Pac Boy • Reversi (A Reversi Player v. 6.1) • YachtC • Gridfire
